about_the_game:
Now you can visit Totem. You gotta be really careful. It is so dark and you are not going to expect where they will come from. You will have to survive in the middle of crazy walkers. The walkers will come to take you down from everywhere. If you succeed in surviving until the final stage, you may face much more stronger geek. It's going to **** you.

Features:

  • Fierce battles against walkers under the darkness
  • Variety of weapons with a small lantern
  • Reactive zombies and boss

    Also, more maps will come soon.

    For reference, a whole in-depth story mode with action packed missions can be experienced with the upcoming launch of Dead GroundZ.
    While you are enjoying Dead Ground Arcade, you may want to put Dead GroundZ on your wishlist as well.
